    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:oai.cnice.mec.es:bioo_es_20070518_2_0030108</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ISFRRP-MEPSYD</catalog>
            <entry>bioo_es_20070518_2_0030108</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="es">La diálisis</string>
            <string language="en">Dialysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dialyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dialyse</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dialysis</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dialisi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διάλυση</string>
          </title>
          <language>es</language>
          <description>
            <string language="es">Investigación en la que el alumno tiene que descubrir en qué consiste la hemodiálisis y el objetivo terapéutico que tiene para un enfermo de riñón.</string>
            <string language="en">Research in which the student must discover what haemodialysis is and the therapeutic purpose which it serves for a person with kidney disease.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">diálisis</string>
            <string language="en">dialysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biosfera</string>
            <string language="en">biosphere</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="es">biología</string>
            <string language="en">Biology</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <value>collection</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung, in der der Kursteilnehmer entdecken 
muß, was Hämodialyse ist und der therapeutische Zweck, den er für 
eine Person mit Nierekrankheit dient.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Recherche dans laquelle l'étudiant doit 
découvrir ce qu'est la hémodialyse et l'objectif thérapeutique 
qu'il atteint à une personne avec la maladie de rein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pesquisa em que o estudante deve descobrir o que 
o haemodialysis é e a finalidade therapeutic a que serve para uma 
pessoa com doença do kidney.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ricerca in cui l'allievo deve scoprire che cosa 
l'emodialisi è e lo scopo terapeutico che serve per una persona con 
la malattia del rene.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Έρευνα στην οποία ο σπουδαστής πρέπει να ανακαλύψει 
ποια αιμοδιάλυση είναι και ο θεραπευτικός σκοπός που εξυπηρετεί 
για ένα πρόσωπο με την ασθένεια νεφρών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dialyse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biosphäre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Biologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">dialyse</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">biosphère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">dialysis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
